PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-05882009-04-23,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
PrecisRegulation amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (Head Restraints) this amendment to standard 202 (Head Restraints) of Schedule IV updates and harmonizes the requirements for head restraints of passenger car to the United States standard for gross vehicle weight rating of 4,536 kg or less (e.g., passenger car, truck, bus and multi-purpose vehicles).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0122 Publication Date: 2009-05-13
AttachmentsAttachment
